patterns: How did a man like you end in here?
responses: I'm just an old man with a passion for coffee and tea. When my father died, I decided to inherit this shop and bring the best coffee and tea to this beautiful town, just like my father always wanted. And, at the end of the day, I very much enjoy the company of my customers.

patterns: What can you tell about this shop?
Tell me more about this shop
responses: This was my father's shop. Back in the day, I used to spend my time here, helping my father with his customers and playing with kids outside. Nowadays, I am trying to keep its spirit alive, as I believe that was what my father's wish.
